name: Thresh

background.notes: Thresh is a weathered Ketra whose bark-like skin bears the scars of countless storms and navigation mishaps. Born without the traditional Ketra connection to any specific grove, they've made the open sea their home. Their cabin is filled with charts, weather instruments, and an impressive collection of bottled storm-essence. Thresh speaks in nautical metaphors and has an uncanny ability to predict weather patterns by taste alone.

drives:
Navigate through an impossible storm
Chart a route no one has ever taken
Predict a disaster and save lives doing so

mires.label: You trust your instruments more than your crew
You speak in confusing nautical terms

aspects.name: Storm Sense (Traits) - Navigator
aspects.details: You can predict weather patterns with supernatural accuracy. Mark to avoid weather-related hazards or gain advantage on navigation rolls.

aspects.name: Chart Master (Traits) - Navigator
aspects.details: Your understanding of navigation is unparalleled. When using charts, you can find routes others cannot and avoid known dangers.

aspects.name: Rooted Resilience (Traits) - Ketra
aspects.details: Your bark-like skin provides natural armor. You have resistance to physical damage and can root yourself to resist being moved.

aspects.name: Wanderer's Wisdom (Traits) - Rootless
aspects.details: Having no fixed home has taught you adaptability. Gain advantage when dealing with unfamiliar situations or cultures.

aspects.name: Navigator's Compass (Gear) - Navigator
aspects.details: An enchanted compass that points toward your destination rather than magnetic north. Mark to never become lost.

aspects.name: Weather Glass (Gear) - Navigator
aspects.details: A delicate instrument that predicts weather changes. Mark to accurately forecast weather up to a week in advance.

aspects.name: Totally Normal Sword
aspects.details: Roll flourish to deal CQ damage (no need to mark). Roll flourish to absorb damage from another sword.

aspects.name: Totally Normal Flintlock
aspects.details: Mark and roll flourish to deal LR damage. Reload: spend an action to unmark.
